page.title: 15Farming in the area.
page.content: Our area is a very rural one.Most of the land is farm land except for the village of Grampound-with-Creed.Most of the farms have been in the same family for generations.There is one farm that belongs to the council and different tenants farm it. At Garlenick farm there is a pheasant breeding programme as well as the more normal type of mixed farming.Cows are bred and there is a small herd of bulls.The game keeper is kept very busy rearing stock for shooting parties. Ventonwyn farm has just been sold after belonging to the same family for generations.It had a reputation for its prize cow herd. All the farms in the area do mixed farming.At Bartilever farm they grow one unusual crop-corn on the cob.This farm has the biggest farm house.
